'''''ve''''' is a [[Quenya]] word meaning "as" or "like".
==Etymology==
Obviously it comes from earlier [[PQ]] *''be'' or *''bê'' (see ''[[tambe]]'').
==Examples==
*''Yéni únótimë '''ve''' rámar aldaron!'' = "long years numberless '''as''' the wings of trees!"<ref>{{RGEO|Namarie}}, line 2</ref>
==See also==
*''[[síve]]''
*''[[tambe]]''
*''[[ben]]'' ([[Sindarin]])
